page.title: 01Sandtoft and Environs
page.content: Mainly agricultural land surrounds the hamlet of Sandtoft, which is part of the parish of nearby Belton. The Reindeer Inn is a very popular pub and restaurant serving not only the local populace but people from quite a distance round the area. The Sandtoft Transport Centre is primarily for preservation and operation of trolley buses but it also includes other items of transport interest. Based on a former world war 2 aerodrome, it has a collection of over 60 vehicles from all over Britain and the continent. Advanced factory units have also been built on part of the the aerodrome by the district council to encourage industry to the area.
